name: Steeplechase
overview: Steeplechase is a 2 player only split screen horse riding/racing game for the Commodore 64. Jump over walls, trees, fences, an other objects, and the first person to reach the course length (selectable between 1,2,3) wins the race, and then it goes back to the title screen. The game was developed by Tony Brantner and published in Ahoy! 1987/08 (Issue #44)
